control
Class Repository

java.lang.Object
  control.Repository
Direct Known Subclasses:
SelfResetRepository
public class Repository
extends java.lang.Object

The Repository class stores all the information about staffs, publications, seminars, groups, administrator and some other item in this system.

The Repository class is using Lazy Initialisation Pattern. The six attributes in Repository: staffMap, publicationMap, seminarMap, groupMap, mapSize and administrator, are all initialised as late as possible. Namely, these six attributes will not be instantiated when constructor of Repository is run. They will only be instantiated at the first time they are used.

The Repository class is responsible for providing get and set methods for each of the Maps and administrator, and also responsible for Synchronising records with files in the file system. Two public and static attributes currentUserName and currentPublication are also provided by Repository class to represent which user is login and which publication is viewed currently.

See Also:
PMSystem, AcademicStaff, RegisteredUser, Publication, Seminar, Group

Field Detail

staffMap

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,AcademicStaff> staffMap
The key of staffMap is a String representing the userName of a staff. The value of staffMap is an AcademicStaff object.

See Also:
Map, AcademicStaff

publicationMap

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Publication> publicationMap
The key of publicationMap is a String representing the ID of a publication. The value of publicationMap is an Publication object.

See Also:
Map, Publication

seminarMap

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Seminar> seminarMap
The key of seminarMap is a Integer representing the ID of a seminar. The value of seminarMap is an Seminar object.

See Also:
Map, Seminar

groupMap

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,Group> groupMap
The key of groupMap is a Integer representing the number of a group. The value of groupMap is an Group object.

See Also:
Map, Group

mapSize

protected java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> mapSize
The key of mapSize is a String representing the name of map counter, which could only be seminarIDAutoIncrement or pubIDAutoIncrement.

The value of seminarIDAutoIncrement represents how much ID of seminar has been used.

The value of pubIDAutoIncrement represents how much ID of publication has been used.

See Also:
Map, Group

administrator

protected RegisteredUser administrator
The entity of administrator.

filePath

private java.lang.String filePath
The path of files this repository save its data in, which should be a format of "filePath/".

currentUserName

public static java.lang.String currentUserName
UserName of the use that login this system currently. Null if it is a general user.

currentPublication

public static java.lang.String currentPublication
ID of the publication that is viewed currently. Null if none is viewed currently.

Constructor Detail

Repository

public Repository()
Initialises a newly created Repository object with all attributes null, since Lazy Initialisation Pattern. And the file path is the default folder.

Repository

public Repository(java.lang.String filePath)
Initialises a newly created Repository object with all attributes null, since Lazy Initialisation Pattern. And the file path is the passed by parameter.

Parameters:
filePath - The relative of file path. It should be in format of "filePath/", which mean all files will be read and saved from "[PMSystem folder]/filePath/".
